public abstract class Enemy extends Character
The super class of an enemy that extends the Character class

  • Constructor Details

    • Enemy

      public Enemy(com.github.hanyaeger.api.Coordinate2D location, Player player, int health, GameScreen gameScreen)
      Creates an Enemy to place on the GameScreen
      Parameters:
      location - Location on the scene
      player - The current Player
      health - The current health and the max health of the Enemy
      gameScreen - The scene where the Enemy is placed

  • Method Details

      public final double getEnemyLevel()
      Gets current level of enemy
      Returns:
      current level of the Enemy

    • setEnemyLevel

      public final void setEnemyLevel()
      Sets level of Enemy by one plus dividing the current level with three. So every three levels an Enemy gets stronger

    • getEnemySpeed
